doc.name: ModelDisplay
doc.description: This actor opens a window to display the specified model. If inputs are provided, they are expected to be MoML strings that are to be applied to the model. This can be used, for example, to create animations.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee, Elaine Cheong
doc.port: The input port through which to provide MoML to modify the model. This has type string.
doc.property: The file or URL from which to read the starting point model. The model is read when this parameter is set or changed.
